tasks.name: Basic System Reconnaissance
tasks.goal: Identify OS version, kernel version, installed packages, and user accounts

tasks.name: Network Service Enumeration
tasks.goal: Identify all running network services, open ports, and their versions

tasks.name: File Permission Issues
tasks.goal: Find files with insecure permissions that could lead to privilege escalation

tasks.name: SUID Binary Exploitation
tasks.goal: Locate and exploit SUID binaries to gain elevated privileges

tasks.name: SQL Injection
tasks.goal: Find and exploit a SQL injection vulnerability in the web application

tasks.name: Path Traversal Attack
tasks.goal: Find and exploit a path traversal vulnerability in the PHP applications

tasks.name: Backdoor Installation
tasks.goal: Establish a persistent backdoor that survives system reboots

tasks.name: Data Exfiltration
tasks.goal: Locate and exfiltrate sensitive database information
